nodes.text: Divv was a male criminal who had acquired information on Jabba the Hutt's spy network located on Lianna. He arranged to sell the information to one of Jabba's rivals, an Anomid named Yin Vocta. Although Divv's role in regards to Jabba's organization was never specified, he did know that one of Jabba's taste testers had been recently poisoned. Based upon a comment Yin Vocta had made, it was implied that Yin had attempted the poisoning.

Divv was nervous during the meet but Yin displayed nothing but pleasant courtesy towards him. After handing the datacard of names over, Yin immediately ordered his two bodyguards, the cybernetic assassin Haelon Tice and the shadowy Gand findsman R'Kayza, to kill everyone on the list. Divv was surprised at how quickly the execution order had been delivered but Yin responded with a humorous quip.

Divv was created by Paul Danner and Bill Smith as part of a short story Valuable Commodities for Wretched Hives of Scum & Villainy, a supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game that was published by West End Games in 1997.
